DOC.brief_summary: The effect of heating precondition of streamlined liner of the pharynx airway (SLIPA) on respiratory mechanics and sore throat was investigated.
DOC.brief_title: Heating Precondition of Streamlined Liner of the Pharynx Airway Decrease the Incidence of Sore Throat
DOC.criteria: Hysteroscopic surgery General anesthesia Upper respiratory disease Communication disfunction
